content.question: Which of the following aspects of colonial America best explains the continuation of slavery despite the spread of the idea of government by consent?

choices.label: The growth of colonial ideas about religious liberty during the Great Awakening
The development of arguments among colonists about racial difference
The spread of Enlightenment political philosophy about natural rights to the colonies
The accommodation of ethnic and cultural diversity by some colonists

content.answer: The development of arguments among colonists about racial difference

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans
